item.title: Recommended Books
item.description: Here are some books that we recommend for those seeking truth and understanding. We encourage you to make a regular practice of picking a book from our list, getting two copies, and reading it with a friend. Bibles ESV Study Bible ESV Daily Reading Bible Reformation Study Bible Devotional Helps For the Love of God (v.1-2) by D.A. Carson Morning and Evening by Charles Spurgeon A Godward Life (v.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: I am new here When and where do you meet? We gather every Sunday to worship together at 10305 South Main Street, Houston, TX. English Service @ 9:15am (Sunday School @ 11:00am) Cantonese Service @ 9:15am (Sunday School @ 11:00am) Mandarin Service @ 11:00am (Sunday School @ 9:15am) Pearland Campus Service @ 2:00pm (Sunday School @ 3:00pm) http://www.pccchome.org/ Currently meeting at the First United Methodist Church â€“ Bethel Building (3887 E Jasmine St, Pearland, TX 77581) What can I expect at your Sunday Worship Service?
